title: Westport, Connecticut
summary: Westport is a town in Fairfield County, Connecticut, United States, along the Long Island Sound within Connecticut's Gold Coast. It is 52 miles (84Â km) northeast of New York City. The town had a population of 26,391 according to the 2010 U.S. Census, and is ranked 19th among America's 100 Richest Places[5] as well as third[5] in Connecticut, with populations between 20,000 and 65,000.[6][7]
